page.title: 13Stowmarket : other churches.
page.content: There are many different churches. The parish church, Methodists, United Reformed Church,Roman Catholic Church and Salvation Army all join together occasionally for united services. Some of the members of these churches joined together as part of the Mission England Choir in 1984; they have kept together and are now an Evangelistic Choir. The churches of the area are also joining together for a "Mission to Stowmarket" in 1986. The Baptist Church, which has about 100 members takes no part in these activities. Other churches are the Elim Church, the Gospel Hall, the Exclusive Brethren and Jehovah's Witnesses.
